CustomField.formula: MAX(Total_Space_EL_Over85__c , Total_Space_EL_Under85__c ) - ( Unconfirmed_Space_EL_Over85__c + Booked_Space_EL_Over85__c + Unconfirmed_Space_EL_Under85__c + Booked_Space_EL_Under85__c + (3 * Booked_Space_VIP_Booking__c) + (3 * Unconfirmed_Space_VIP_Booking__c) )
CustomField.label: Total Available Luggage space
